title: Ticket #7207: Disk High Watermark not recorded in history
description:
The Disk High Watermark is not recorded in the history. Instead, the final value is recorded.

[Adding DiskUsage and disk usage to help find this ticket again later, should it come up.]
remarks:
2019-Nov-14 14:18:11 by tannenba:
Seems like the fix should be targeting v8.8 (bug fix) instead of v8.9.... unless it was introduced in v8.9....

2019-Dec-02 13:08:02 by tim:
I think that this was introduced in the 8.9 series. Greg could correct me if I'm wrong.
2020-Apr-10 07:46:37 by tim:
Bulk change of target version from v080906 to v080907 using ticket-target-mover.

2020-Jul-14 10:34:58 by tlmiller:
IanR just got bit by this.

2020-Jul-14 11:56:36 by gthain:
CODE REVIEW All good.
check_ins:

2020-Jul-14 10:59   Check-in [60124]: (#7207) Duplicate the fix from #7049 for disk usage, as well. Note that the CPU usage attributes don't end in 'Usage', so we shouldn't have to fix this again. (By Todd L Miller )
creator: tim
